participant_1.background:
I still enjoy my meat but have become a responsible adult.
I've never been afraid to try new things, but my first time competing in a beauty pageant was definitely the most difficult thing I've ever done.
i love lasagna like i m garfield.
I do yoga every morning to keep my body healthy and flexible, but I'm not able to go to high altitudes because of my condition.
I procrastinate on chores because I'd rather spend time with my pets.

I do not wish to disclose my marital status.
i like football.
I can't do gymnastics if I were blind because I need to see my surroundings and the equipment to be able to do them safely.
I like to spend my days trying new things and exploring new places, especially with friends who encourage me to push my boundaries.
my favorite subject in school was science.

content.text: Hi! I'm looking for someone to talk to about my upcoming beauty pageant.
Hi! I'd be happy to chat with you. I'm not a pageant expert, but I'm always happy to offer support.
Thanks! I'm really nervous about it, but I'm excited to try something new.
I'm sure you'll do great! What are you most nervous about?
I'm worried about making a fool of myself. I've never done anything like this before.
I know what you mean. It's always scary to try something new. But I'm sure you'll do great. You seem like a confident person.
Thanks! I'm trying to be. I've been practicing my walk and my speech, but it's still hard to imagine myself up there in front of all those people.
I know it's hard, but just remember that everyone is there to support you. And if you mess up, it's not the end of the world. Everyone makes mistakes.
Thanks for the pep talk! I'm feeling a little better about it now.
Great! I'm glad I could help. So, what's your favorite part of the pageant process so far?
I think my favorite part is getting to meet all the other contestants. They're all so beautiful and talented. It's been really inspiring.
That's so great! I'm sure you'll all make some great friends.
I hope so! I'm looking forward to seeing them all at the pageant.
Me too! I'm sure it will be a lot of fun.
Thanks for talking to me! This has really helped me calm down about the pageant.
You're welcome! I'm glad I could help. Good luck!
